Verses: 1 DHEVANUKKUM KARTHTHARAAGIYA YESUKIRISTHUVUKKUM OOZHIYAKKAARANAAGIYA YAAKKOBU, SIDHARIYIRUKKIRA PANNIRANDU KOTHTHIRANGALUKKUM VAAZHTHTHUDHAL SOLLI EZHUDHUGIRADHAAVADHU:
2 EN SAGODHARARE, NEENGAL PALAVIDHAMAANA SODHANAIGALIL AGAPPADUMPODHU,
3 UNGAL VISUVAASATHTHIN PAREETCHAIYAANADHU PORUMAIYAI UNDAAKKUMENDRU ARINDHU, ADHAI MIGUNDHA SANDHOSHAMAAGA ENNUNGAL.
4 NEENGAL ONDRILUM KURAIVULLAVARGALAAYIRAAMAL, POORANARAAYUM NIRAIVULLAVARGALAAYUM IRUKKUMPADI, PORUMAIYAANADHU POORANA KIRIYAI SEYYAKKATAVADHU.

5 UNGALIL ORUVAN GNAANATHTHIL KURAIVULLAVANAAYIRUNDHAAL, YAAVARUKKUM SAMPOORANAMAAI KODUKKIRAVARUM ORUVARAIYUM KADINDHUKOLLAADHAVARUMAAGIYA DHEVANIDATHTHIL KETKAKKADAVAN, APPOZHUDHU AVANUKKU KODUKKAPPADUM.
6 AANAALUM AVAN EVVALAVAAGILUM SANDHEGAPPADAAMAL VISUVAASATHTHODE KETKAKKADAVAN; SANDHEKAPPADUGIRAVAN KAATRINAAL ADIPATTU ALAIGIRA KADALIN ALAIKKU OPPAAYIRUKKIRAAN.
7 APPADIPPATTA MANUSHAN THAAN KARTHTHARIDATHTHIL EDHAIYAAGILUM PERALAAMENDRU NINAIYAADHIRUPPAANAAGA.
8 IRUMANAMULLAVAN THAN VAZHIGALILELLAAM NILAIYATRAVANAAYIRUKKIRAAN.
9 THAAZHNDHA SAGODHARAN THAAN UYARTHTHAPPATTADHAIKKURITHTHU MENMAIPAARAATTAKKADAVAN.
10 AISUVARIYAVAAN THAAN THAAZHTHTHAPPATTADHAIKKURITHTHU MENMAIPAARAATTAKKADAVAN; ENENIL AVAN PULLIN POOVAIPPOL OZHINDHUPOVAAN.
11 SOORIYAN KADUM VEYYILUDAN UDHITHTHU, PULLAI ULARTHTHUMPODHU, ADHIN POO UDHIRNDHU, ADHIN AZHAGAANA VADIVU AZHINDHUPOM; AISUVARIYAVAANUM APPADIYE THAN VAZHIGALIL VAADIPPOVAAN.
12 SODHANAIYAI SAGIKKIRA MANUSHAN BAAKKIYAVAAN; AVAN UTHTHAMANENDRU VILANGINAPINBU KARTHTHAR THAMMIDATHTHIL ANBUKOORUGIRAVARGALUKKU VAAKKUTHTHATHTHAM PANNINA JEEVAKIREEDATHTHAIP PERUVAAN.
13 SODHIKKAPPADUGIRA EVANUM, NAAN DHEVANAAL SODHIKKAPPADUGIREN ENDRU SOLLAADHIRUPPAANAAGA; DHEVAN POLLAANGINAAL SODHIKKAPPADUGIRAVARALLA, ORUVANAIYUM AVAR SODHIKKIRAVARUMALLA.
14 AVANAVAN THANTHAN SUYA ICHCHAIYINAALE IZHUKKAPPATTU, SIKKUNDU, SODHIKKAPPADUGIRAAN.
15 PINBU ICHCHAIYAANADHU KARPPANDHARITHTHU, PAAVATHTHAI PIRAPPIKKUM, PAAVAM POORANAMAAGUMPODHU, MARANATHTHAI PIRAPPIKKUM.
16 EN PIRIYAMAANA SAGODHARARE, MOSAMPOGAADHIRUNGAL.

17 NANMAIYAANA ENDHA EEVUM POORANAMAANA ENDHA VARAMUM PARATHTHILIRUNDHUNDAAGI, SODHIGALIN PIDHAAVINITATHTHILIRUNDHU IRANGIVARUGIRADHU; AVARIDATHTHIL YAADHORU MAARUDHALUM YAADHORU VETRUMAIYIN NIZHALUMILLAI.
18 AVAR SITHTHANGONDU THAMMUDAIYA SIRUSHTIGALIL NAAM MUDHARPALANGALAAVADHARKU NAMMAI SATHTHIYA VASANATHTHINAALE JENIPPITHTHAAR.
19 AAGAIYAAL, EN PIRIYAMAANA SAGODHARARE, YAAVARUM KETKIRADHARKU THEEVIRAMAAYUM, PESUGIRADHARKU PORUMAIYAAYUM, KOBIKKIRADHARKU THAAMADHAMAAYUMIRUKKAKKADAVARGAL;
20 MANUSHARUDAIYA KOBAM DHEVANUDAIYA NEEDHIYAI NADAPPIKKAMAATTAADHE.

21 AAGAIYAAL, NEENGAL ELLAAVIDHA AZHUKKAIYUM KODIYA THURGUNATHTHAIYUM OZHITHTHUVITTU, UNGAL ULLATHTHIL NAATTAPPATTADHAAYUM UNGAL AATHTHUMAAKKALAI RATCHIKKA VALLAMAIYULLADHAAYUMIRUKKIRA VASANATHTHAI SAANDHAMAAI ETRUKKOLLUNGAL.
22 ALLAAMALUM, NEENGAL UNGALAI VANJIYAADHAPADIKKU THIRUVASANATHTHAI KETKIRAVARGALAAI MAATHTHIRAMALLA, ADHINPADI SEYGIRAVARGALAAYUM IRUNGAL.
23 ENNATHTHINAALENIL, ORUVAN THIRUVASANATHTHAI KETTUM ADHINPADI SEYYAADHAVANAANAAL, KANNAADIYILE THAN SUBAAVA MUGATHTHAI PAARKKIRA MANUSHANUKKU OPPAAYIRUPPAAN;
24 AVAN THANNAITHTHAANE PAARTHTHU, AVVIDAMVITTU PONAVUDANE, THANSAAYAL INNADHENPADHAI MARANDHUVIDUVAAN.

25 SUYAADHEENAPPIRAMAANAMAAGIYA POORANAPPIRAMAANATHTHAI UTRUPPAARTHTHU, ADHILE NILAITHTHIRUKKIRAVANE KETKIRADHAI MARAKKIRAVANAAYIRAAMAL, ADHARKETRA KIRIYAI SEYGIRAVANAAYIRUNDHU, THAN SEYGAIYIL BAAKKIYAVAANAAYIRUPPAAN.
26 UNGALIL ORUVAN THAN NAAVAI ADAKKAAMAL, THAN IRUDHAYATHTHAI VANJITHTHU, THANNAI DHEVAPAKTHIYULLAVANENDRU ENNINAAL AVANUDAIYA DHEVAPAKTHI VEENAAYIRUKKUM.

27 THIKKATRA PILLAIGALUM VIDHAVAIGALUM PADUGIRA UBATHTHIRAVATHTHILE AVARGALAI VISAARIKKIRADHUM, ULAGATHTHAAL KARAIPADAADHAPADIKKUTH THANNAIK KAATHTHUKKOLLUGIRADHUME PIDHAAVAAGIYA DHEVANUKKUMUNBAAGA MAASILLAADHA SUTHTHAMAANA BAKTHIYAAYIRUKKIRADHU
